title: Uncle Si Discovers Tinder
description:
Si is about to learn what "swipe right" means when Martin tries to convince him he has a Tinder account. Martin riles up a vocal flock of sandhill crane lovers with a social media post. Si and Jay Stone welcome their buddy Dr. Dean to talk about his suspect medical credentials. Stone can't get enough of Si's morale boosting. John-David explains his problem with the Bengals' "Who Dey" chant. And the boys try to help out a mom whose son is a genius with no common sense.
-
